attachments.fallback: Steam で 70% オフ:The Walking Fish 2: Final Frontier
attachments.title: Steam で 70% オフ:The Walking Fish 2: Final Frontier
attachments.text: The Walking Fish returns, this time in space, in an all-new fish comedy horror experience. Stuck on a space station, you have to solve the mystery of the Walking Fish, and escape its terror.
